saveModal.title: Save to Vault
saveModal.unlockMessage: Unlock the vault to save the password

duress.enabled: Duress Mode Enabled! The application will now restart to apply the new security container.

duressModal.title: Plausible Deniability Setup
duressModal.explanation1: This advanced security feature creates a secondary "Decoy" Vault hidden within your main vault file.
duressModal.explanation2: If you are forced to unlock your vault under duress, enter your Duress Password instead of your Master Password.
duressModal.explanation3: The app will unlock the Decoy Vault, which looks fully functional but contains non-sensitive data. It is mathematically impossible to prove the existence of your Real Vault.
duressModal.duressPlaceholder: Cannot be same as Master Password
duressModal.duressHint: Entering this password at login will open the Decoy Vault.
duressModal.autofillHint: Generate realistic "fake" entries (e.g. Amazon, Google) so the vault doesn't look suspicious/empty.
duressModal.mustBeDifferent: Duress password MUST be different from Master password.
duressModal.successMessage: Duress Mode Enabled! Restarting to apply security container...

shareModal.title: Secure Share (GenPwd Send)
shareModal.infoText: Create a secure encrypted link to share this password. The decryption key will be included in the URL but never sent to the server.
shareModal.warningText: This link grants access to the secret. Only share it with the intended recipient.

danger.destroyConfirm1: This action will PERMANENTLY DESTROY this vault. There will be NO way to undo this.

export.title: ðŸ“¤ Advanced Export
export.description: Export {count} password(s) to various password manager formats
export.selectFormatDetails: Select a format to see details

formats.keepassCsv: CSV format compatible with KeePass password manager. Fields: Account, Login Name, Password, Web Site, Comments.
formats.bitwardenJson: JSON format for Bitwarden. Full-featured with folders, favorites, and timestamps.
formats.lastpassCsv: CSV format compatible with LastPass. Fields: url, username, password, extra, name, grouping.
formats.onepasswordCsv: CSV format for 1Password. Fields: Title, URL, Username, Password, Notes, Category.
formats.genericJson: Universal JSON format with all fields. Can be re-imported to GenPwd Pro.
formats.genericCsv: Simple CSV format with basic fields: title, username, password, url, notes.

import.title: ðŸ“¥ Advanced Import
import.description: Import passwords from popular password managers

breach.privacyDescription: This check uses k-anonymity to preserve your privacy. Only the first 5 characters of the password hash are sent to the HIBP API. Your actual password never leaves your device.
breach.pwnedWarning: âš ï¸ {count} password(s) found in breach database

welcome.title: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to GenPwd Pro!
welcome.text: Generate secure, memorable passwords in seconds. Let me show you around!

generator.title: ðŸ” Password Generator
generator.text: Choose from three modes: Syllables (pronounceable), Passphrase (Diceware-style), or Leet speak.

length.title: ðŸ“ Customize Length
length.text: Adjust password length or word count. We recommend 16+ characters or 5+ words for strong security.

options.title: âš™ï¸ Password Options
options.text: Add numbers, special characters, or change case. More complexity = stronger password!

generate.title: âœ¨ Generate!
generate.text: Click Generate to create your password. It's automatically copied to clipboard for 30 seconds.

results.title: ðŸ“Š Password Strength
results.text: Check your password's entropy (randomness). Higher is better! Aim for 60+ bits.

vault.title: ðŸ—„ï¸ Vault Storage
vault.text: Save passwords securely in your encrypted Vault. AES-256-GCM encryption, Argon2id key derivation.

about.title: âš™ï¸ Settings & Features
about.text: Explore more features: Cloud Sync, Import/Export, TOTP 2FA, and Dark Mode!

complete.title: ðŸŽ‰ You're All Set!
complete.text: You're ready to generate secure passwords. Need help? Check the About section or visit our GitHub.

intro.title: ðŸ—„ï¸ Vault Tour
intro.text: Store passwords securely in your encrypted vault. Let's explore!

addPassword.title: âž• Add Password
addPassword.text: Click here to add a new password entry to your vault.

search.title: ðŸ” Search & Filter
search.text: Quickly find passwords by name, website, or category.

export.title: ðŸ“¤ Import/Export
export.text: Export to JSON, CSV, or KDBX. Import from 1Password, LastPass, KeePass.

generic.tryAgain: An error occurred. Please try again.

sync.locked: SyncService is locked. Call unlock() first.
sync.decryptFailed: Failed to decrypt remote vault. Password may have changed.

auth.expired: Authentication expired. Please sign in again.
auth.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please re-authorize the app.
auth.noCredentials: No valid credentials. Please sign in with Google.
auth.accessRevoked: Access was revoked. Please sign in again.
auth.masterPasswordTooShort: Master password must be at least 8 characters
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Try again in {minutes} minute(s).

file.notFound: File not found. Check the file path or restore from backup.
file.accessDenied: Access denied. Run as administrator or check folder permissions.
file.alreadyExists: File already exists. Choose a different name or location.
file.noSpace: Not enough disk space. Free up space and try again.
file.inUse: File is in use. Close other applications and retry.
file.operationNotPermitted: Operation not permitted. Check file permissions.

database.busy: Database busy. Close other apps using the vault and retry.
database.corrupted: Database corrupted. Restore from backup or create a new vault.
database.error: Database error. Try restarting the application.

crypto.encryptionError: Encryption error. Verify your password is correct.
crypto.decryptionFailed: Decryption failed: Invalid key or corrupted data
crypto.invalidHexLength: Hex string must have even length
crypto.jsonParseFailed: Decryption succeeded but JSON parsing failed: {message}
crypto.invalidPassword: Invalid password: must be a non-empty string
crypto.invalidKeyData: Invalid keyData: must be an object
crypto.invalidSalt: Invalid keyData.salt: must be a base64 string
crypto.saltTooShort: Invalid salt: must be at least 16 bytes
crypto.invalidVerifier: Invalid keyData.verifier: must be a base64 string
crypto.secureStorageFailed: Secure storage required but failed - cannot store OAuth tokens

network.error: Network error. Check your internet connection.
network.timeout: Operation timed out. Check your connection and retry.
network.conflict: Conflict detected. Remote file was modified.
network.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please try again later.
network.rateLimitedShort: Too many requests. Please slow down.

validation.pathTraversal: Invalid path: path traversal not allowed
validation.absolutePathRequired: Invalid path: must be an absolute path
validation.reservedName: Invalid path: Windows reserved name not allowed
validation.invalidParameter: Invalid parameter: {name} must be a non-empty string
validation.parameterTooLong: Invalid parameter: {name} exceeds maximum length of {maxLength} characters
validation.mustBeObject: Invalid parameter: {name} must be an object
validation.fieldTooLong: Field "{field}" exceeds maximum length of {maxLength} characters
validation.invalidEntryType: Invalid entry type: {type}. Must be one of: {validTypes}
validation.entryMustBeObject: Entry data must be an object
validation.colorMustBeHex: color must be a valid hex color (e.g., #6366f1)
validation.entryTitleRequired: Entry title must be a non-empty string

vault.unlockFirst: Vault is locked. Please unlock first.
vault.jsonParseError: Invalid vault file: JSON parse error - {message}
vault.missingFields: Invalid vault file format: missing {fields}. File keys: [{keys}]

windowsHello.notAvailable: Windows Hello is not available on this system
windowsHello.windowsOnly: Windows Hello is only available on Windows
windowsHello.credentialManagerWindowsOnly: Credential Manager is only available on Windows
windowsHello.credentialNotFound: Windows Hello credential not found. Please re-enable Windows Hello.
windowsHello.notConfigured: Windows Hello not configured for this vault. Please re-enable it with your master password.
windowsHello.storeCredentialsFailed: Failed to store Windows Hello credentials
windowsHello.decryptionError: Decryption error. Please re-enable Windows Hello.
windowsHello.invalidVaultId: Invalid vaultId: must be a non-empty string
